entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.5°C

Temperature: -1.5°C

Visibility: 12.9 km
Wind Chill: -3

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:27 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:27 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 6:27 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
